data.text: @filantropix68 I can't imagine that the Tory front bench could March  too far due to the weight of all the roubles they like to collect from their Russian billionaire friends
@filantropix68 Watched Berlin Philharmonic Digital last night full house every single person in the audience wearing a mask.
The Health Secretary's German counterpart is also there. Imagine any UK Government member doing this. https://t.co/SdVtNTb4QP
@filantropix68 Only according to the Tory front bench, I'm surprised that there not claiming that the Invasion of the Ukraine is fake as well
